author: ddiaz006
body:
#### PR description:
* Add ML-based LLP Jet tagger to Phase-2 Level-1 trigger emulator; codenamed TOoLLiP
* Requires TOoLLiP external integrated here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8906
* Compiled object file added under L1Trigger/Phase2L1ParticleFlow/test until above PR is approved
* Presented at L1 Tau-Jets-MET meetings, e.g. 
  * https://indico.cern.ch/event/1288096/#9-llp-jet-tagging-status-and-p
  * https://indico.cern.ch/event/1350143/contributions/5683985/
* This model represents a v1 baseline with post-training quantization. We expect to update it with a more realistic firmware implementation.
* Model and expected performance plots shown here: https://github.com/cms-hls4ml/TOoLLiP/blob/main/README.md
* L1T Offline PR: https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1195
* TOoLLiP in cms-hls4ml : https://github.com/cms-hls4ml/TOoLLiP

#### PR validation:

In progress
title: TOoLLiP integration
